  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92589</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92589</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The greenhouse effect</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Gewächshauseffekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de serre chaude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito da estufa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto della serra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το φαινόμενο του θερμοκηπίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto del invernadero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows why it is always warmer inside the greenhouse than outside.  The glasses of the greenhouse allows certain heat rays to enter while trapping other rays inside.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">greenhouse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trapped heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, warum sie immer innerhalb 
des Gewächshauses als draußen wärmer ist. Die Gläser des 
Gewächshauses läßt bestimmte Hitzestrahlen beim andere Strahlen 
nach innen einschließen hereinkommen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre pourquoi il fait 
toujours plus chaud à l'intérieur de la serre chaude que dehors. 
Les verres de la serre chaude permet à certains raies de la 
chaleur d'entrer tout en emprisonnant d'autres rayons à l'intérieur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra porque está sempre mais
morna dentro da estufa do que fora. Os vidros da estufa permitem
que determinados raios do calor entrem ao prender outros raios para 
dentro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra perchè è sempre 
più calda all'interno della serra che all'esterno. I vetri 
della serra permette che i raggi sicuri di calore entrino mentre 
intrappolano altri raggi all'interno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γιατί είναι πάντα 
θερμότερη μέσα στο θερμοκήπιο από έξω. Τα γυαλιά του 
θερμοκηπίου επιτρέπουν σε ορισμένες ακτίνες θερμότητας για να 
εισαχθούν παγιδεύοντας άλλες ακτίνες μέσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra porqué es siempre más 
caliente dentro del invernadero que afuera. Los cristales del 
invernadero permiten que ciertos rayos del calor entren mientras que 
atrapan otros rayos adentro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewächshaus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzestrahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aufgefangene Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">serre chaude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayons de la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur emprisonnée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estufa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raios do calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calor prendido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">serra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggi di calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calore bloccato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμοκήπιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνες θερμότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παγιδευμένη θερμότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">invernadero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayos del calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">calor atrapado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
